Text.Language: Ten]ho ouoh tentwbh n~tekmeta~gayoc pimairwmi: a~riv~meui P[oic m~pianjwj n~te penkahi pekbwk.
We ask and entreat Your Goodness, O Lover of Mankind: remember, O Lord, the ruler of our land, Your servant.

Piouro [piproedroc] n~te penkahi pekbwk.
The king [leader] of our land, Your servantâ€”

Twbh hina n~te Pi,~rictoc Pennou] t/iten n~hannai nem hanmetsenh/t m~pem~yo n~niexoucia eta~mahi: n~tefermalazin m~pouh/t e~qoun e~ron e~pia~gayon n~c/ou niben: n~tef,a nennobi nan e~bol.
Pray that Christ our God may grant us mercy and compassion before the ruling authorities, and soften their heart toward us for that which is good at all times, and forgive us our sins.

Areh e~rof qen ouhir/n/ nem oumeym/i nem oumetjwri.
keep him in peace, righteousness, and strength.

Marou[~nejwou naf t/rou n~je nibarbaroc: nieynoc n/eyouws n~nibwtc: p~roc y/e~te ywn t/rou n~euyenia.
May all the barbarians, the nations that desire wars against all our prosperity be subdued unto him.

Caji e~q~r/i e~pefh/t eybe ]hir/n/ n~te tekoui~ m~mauatc eyouab n~kayolik/ n~a~poctolik/ n~ekk~l/cia.
Speak to his heart concerning the peace of Your one only holy catholic and apostolic Church.

M/ic naf e~meui~ e~hanhir/nikon e~qoun e~ron nem e~qoun e~pekran eyouab.
Grant him to think peaceably toward us and toward Your holy name

Hina a~non hwn enwnq qen oubioc efhourwou ouoh efwrf: n~cejemten ensop qen meteuceb/c niben nem metcemnoc niben e~qoun e~rok.
that we too may lead a quiet and peaceful life, and may be found dwelling in all godliness and all dignity in You.
